dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
Dear Skate Videos Online,

 

It has come to our attention that you have made an unauthorized use of our copyrighted works entitled, 411VM (all titles), Jereme Rogers Neighborhood, Our Life (Oakley), Skate More (DVS), Elementality 1 (Element), on your website ww.skatevideosonline.net.  As you neither asked nor received permission to use or distribute copies (including electronic copies) of the works, you have willfully infringed our rights under 17 U.S.C. Section 101 et seq. and could be liable for statutory damages as high as $150,000 as set forth in Section 504(c)(2) therein.

 

We demand that you immediately cease the use and distribution of the works and that you desist from this or any other infringement of my rights in the future.  If we have not received an affirmative response from you by January 19, 2007 indicating you have fully complied with these requirements, we shall take further action against you.

 

Regards,

 

Zack Sugarman
